secondary: We have everything you need to get in the water
tertiary: The Best Waves, The Best Beaches
cuaternary: Learn how to surf with us!

secondary: Find the perfect board for you
All the gear, all the year
cuaternary: Do you want to surf and don't know how?

primary: The best surf supplies shop in the entire Costa Brava, and probably the best surf shop in the entire mediterranean. Explore the best Mare Nostrum big waves with us!
secondary: Everything you need to surf. Come to visit us and get your entire gear here.
Longboards, shortboards, windsurfing. But not kite-surf. We don't like kite surf. Don't do that. No. Don't.
All kind of accesories. The best brands. Locally sourced bee wax for your boards.
cuaternary:
• All the gear is included
  • We have the best instructors in the area
  • Several skill levels
If you want to discover how to ride a wave, our instructors can teach you. Surf classes every day of the year, no matter what.

title: Our clients
description: I can find everything I need at {{title}}. Every time I pay them a visit, they have cool new gear to spend my hard-earned money in this pointless hobbie.
The first time I surfed was in the {{title}} initiation course. Before that, I tried to learn myself and the only thing I got was a broken arm. 100% recommended!
I've been purchasing stuff from them for years. With the amount of money I've give them, I could have purchased a house in Malibu already.
name: Ramon, Tarifa
Mikael, Zahara de los Atunes
Joan, Tarragona
